description: These simple apple muffins are naturally sweetened and deliciously spiced.
name: Cinnamon, Apple & Pecan Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 210째C/190째C fan-forced and line a muffin pan with 12 paper cases.

Whisk the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, mixed spice and pecans together in a large bowl. Mix the wet ingredients together in a bowl, pour into the dry ingredients and gently mix to combine.

Fold in the grated apple. Spoon the batter into the muffin cases, filling each to the top and bake for 5 minutes, reduce the heat to 170째C/150째C fan-forced and bake for 18 minutes until a skewer comes out clean.
Cool for 5 minutes in the muffin pan and transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.
